dict.acceptation: 坚持；强调；坚决要求；坚决认为；

sent.orig: I insist on your taking/insist that you take immediate action to put this right.
sent.trans: 我坚决要求你立刻采取行动把事情处理好。

sent.orig: Insist upon good housekeeping in your laboratory. Secure all gas cylinders.
sent.trans: 请维持实验室之整洁，确保气体钢瓶的安全。

sent.orig: We insist upon a definite answer.
sent.trans: 我们一定要得到一个肯定的答复。

sent.orig: I'd love to go, but I insist we go Dutch.
sent.trans: 我很愿意去，但我坚持我们各付各的。

sent.orig: We Americans insist on holding to the connection between freedom and justice, courage and moderation.
sent.trans: 我们美国人坚持且重视自由和正义、勇气和中道间的关联性。
